00011 //! \file
00012 //! Contains most system-specific includes and definitions. On windows
00013 //! systems, it corresponds to stdafx.h. On other systems, the
00014 //! appropriate data types and macros are declared here.

00020

00022   #define WIN32_LEAN_AND_MEAN  /* Prevent including <winsock*.h> in <windows.h> */
00023   #define VC_EXTRALEAN  // Exclude rarely-used stuff from Windows headers
00024   #include <windows.h>
00025   #include <stdlib.h>
